titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on low expansion stoppers, lids, and other closures, and for other purposes.
To extend the temporary suspension of duty on low expansion stoppers, lids, and other closures, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on low expansion stoppers, lids, and other closures, and for other purposes.
